formElement.label: Destination Directory:
formElement.documentation: Indicate the path where the source tree will be created (can be relative to the job's workspace).

formElement.label: Server Pool or Resource
formElement.documentation: Server pool to use for a cluster setup.

formElement.label: Overwrite mode
formElement.documentation: Overwrite mode, remove nonexistent in DSL elements.

formElement.label: Configuration:
formElement.documentation: The name of a saved SCM configuration.

formElement.label: Commit Hash:
formElement.documentation: The Commit Hash to update the index. Note: This will move the HEAD.

formElement.label: Remote Branch:
formElement.documentation: The name of the Git branch to use. ie: 'experimental'.

formElement.label: Clone?:
formElement.documentation: This option will clone a repository into a newly created directory.

formElement.label: Overwrite?:
formElement.documentation: This option will overwrite a repository if it already exists.

formElement.label: Depth:
formElement.documentation: Create a shallow clone with a history truncated to the specified number of revisions.

formElement.label: Tag:
formElement.documentation: Provide the name of a specific tag to checkout after the clone command.

formElement.label: Git repository:
formElement.documentation: URL to the repository to pull from. ie: 'git://server/repo.git'.
